pageContext.description: Cast marks. Edge damaged and points turned.  One wing is hacked
pageContext.other: The Site description bears the following elaboration- not really room for it in the box: " found in deepening a ditch between Kilfillan and Balcarry in a spot which had been a morass or loch within a foot of each other in 1875 on a farm occupied by Mr Lilper. South of Glenluce
